meanings.definition: To concentrate on a particular subject or activity.
meanings.sent1: She focusses on her homework every evening.
meanings.sent2: He always focusses on his work during meetings.
meanings.sent3: The cat focusses intently on the moving toy.
meanings.sent4: Her mind focusses like a laser beam when she reads.
meanings.sent5: His determination focusses his efforts on success.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the verb 'focus'.
meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the different focusses of the students.
meanings.sent2: Their focusses varied depending on the task at hand.
meanings.sent3: The group discussed their individual focusses for the project.
meanings.sent4: The multiple focusses of the team led to a comprehensive solution.
meanings.sent5: The diverse focusses in the room created a dynamic atmosphere.
